fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Enerfair Engagement Ltd is currently working on aspects of the Clean Energy Package, the EU Long Term Emissions Reduction Strategy, the ETS Innovation Fund and the Clean Mobility Package.
goals__remit: Enerfair Engagement Ltd offers strategic communications and policy support services to organisations working to tackle climate change, reduce carbon dioxide emissions and transition towards a net zero emissions economy.
relevant_communication: Enerfair Engagement Ltd may undertake public relations and communications activities with clients, including providing advice on policy, media and communications strategies. Enerfair Engagement Ltd may also occasionally contact officials and representatives of the EU institutions on its own accord or on behalf of clients.
legal_status: Private Limited Company registered in England
customers: Bellona Europa# University of Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership
